words.spanish: El fin de semana que viene

words.english: What are you going to do?

dialog.speaker: Sofía
dialog.spanish: Hola, ¿cómo estás? Ayer hablé con tu hermana.
dialog.english: Hello, how are you? Yesterday I spoke with your sister.

dialog.speaker: Pablo
dialog.spanish: Estoy bien. ¿Qué tal? Yo no la vi ayer.
dialog.english: I'm good. How's it going? I didn't see her yesterday.

dialog.speaker: Sofía
dialog.spanish: Ella dijo que hoy va a comer con su amiga.
dialog.english: She said that today she is going to eat with her friend.

dialog.speaker: Pablo
dialog.spanish: Sí, es verdad. Mañana, yo y ella vamos a ir al cine.
dialog.english: Yes, it's true. Tomorrow, she and I are going to go to the cinema.

dialog.speaker: Sofía
dialog.spanish: ¡Qué divertido! Yo también voy a ir mañana, pero con mi familia.
dialog.english: How fun! I'm also going tomorrow, but with my family.

questions.question: ¿Qué va a hacer la hermana de Pablo hoy?
¿Qué van a hacer Pablo y su hermana mañana?

dialog.speaker: Mario
dialog.spanish: ¿Qué hiciste el fin de semana pasado?
dialog.english: What did you do last weekend?

dialog.speaker: Ana
dialog.spanish: Yo fui a la playa y comí mucho pescado.
dialog.english: I went to the beach and ate a lot of fish.

dialog.speaker: Mario
dialog.spanish: ¡Qué bien! Yo estoy en el trabajo ahora.
dialog.english: How nice! I am at work now.

dialog.speaker: Ana
dialog.spanish: Yo también estoy trabajando. ¿Y qué vas a hacer mañana?
dialog.english: I am also working. And what are you going to do tomorrow?

dialog.speaker: Mario
dialog.spanish: Mañana no trabajo. Yo voy a ir a un restaurante con mi familia.
dialog.english: Tomorrow I don't work. I am going to go to a restaurant with my family.

questions.question: ¿Qué hizo Ana el fin de semana pasado?

dialog.speaker: David
dialog.spanish: ¿Fuiste a España el año pasado?
dialog.english: Did you go to Spain last year?

dialog.speaker: Laura
dialog.spanish: Sí, fui con mi familia. La comida fue deliciosa.
dialog.english: Yes, I went with my family. The food was delicious.

dialog.speaker: David
dialog.spanish: ¡Qué divertido! Yo voy a ir a Italia el año que viene.
dialog.english: How fun! I am going to go to Italy next year.

dialog.speaker: Laura
dialog.spanish: Qué bien. Nosotros vamos a vivir en una ciudad diferente en el futuro.
dialog.english: How nice. We are going to live in a different city in the future.

dialog.speaker: David
dialog.spanish: ¿A dónde van a vivir?
dialog.english: Where are you going to live?

questions.question: ¿A dónde fue Laura el año pasado?
¿A dónde va a ir David el año que viene?

dialog.speaker: Javier
dialog.spanish: ¿Por qué estás tan feliz?
dialog.english: Why are you so happy?

dialog.speaker: Clara
dialog.spanish: Porque estuve de vacaciones la semana pasada.
dialog.english: Because I was on vacation last week.

dialog.speaker: Javier
dialog.spanish: ¡Qué suerte! Yo estoy muy cansado hoy.
dialog.english: How lucky! I am very tired today.

dialog.speaker: Clara
dialog.spanish: No te preocupes. Mañana vas a estar bien. Yo soy feliz.
dialog.english: Don't worry. Tomorrow you are going to be fine. I am happy.

dialog.speaker: Javier
dialog.spanish: Gracias. Mañana voy a ser feliz.
dialog.english: Thank you. Tomorrow I am going to be happy.

questions.question: ¿Por qué Clara está feliz?
options: Estuvo de vacaciones la semana pasada
questions.answer: Estuvo de vacaciones la semana pasada

dialog.speaker: Marta
dialog.spanish: ¿Qué hiciste anoche?
dialog.english: What did you do last night?

dialog.speaker: Luis
dialog.spanish: Comí una pizza en casa y vi una película.
dialog.english: I ate a pizza at home and watched a movie.

dialog.speaker: Marta
dialog.spanish: Yo comí en un restaurante. ¿Qué vas a hacer hoy?
dialog.english: I ate in a restaurant. What are you going to do today?

dialog.speaker: Luis
dialog.spanish: Hoy no voy a hacer mucho. Voy a estudiar.
dialog.english: Today I am not going to do much. I am going to study.

dialog.speaker: Marta
dialog.spanish: Yo voy a estudiar contigo. ¡Juntos!
dialog.english: I am going to study with you. Together!

questions.question: ¿Qué van a hacer Luis y Marta hoy?

stories.title: Mi Día: Ayer, Hoy y Mañana

sentences.spanish: Ayer fue un día muy ocupado. Yo trabajé todo el día.
sentences.english: Yesterday was a very busy day. I worked all day.

sentences.spanish: También hablé con mi amigo y fui a la tienda para comprar comida.
sentences.english: I also spoke with my friend and went to the store to buy food.

sentences.spanish: Hoy es diferente. Yo estoy en mi casa y no trabajo.
sentences.english: Today is different. I am in my house and I am not working.

sentences.spanish: Leo un libro y como un sándwich.
sentences.english: I am reading a book and eating a sandwich.

sentences.spanish: Estoy muy relajado y feliz.
sentences.english: I am very relaxed and happy.

sentences.spanish: Mañana voy a ir al gimnasio para hacer ejercicio.
sentences.english: Tomorrow I am going to go to the gym to exercise.

sentences.spanish: También voy a ver una película con mi familia. Va a ser muy divertido.
sentences.english: I am also going to watch a movie with my family. It is going to be very fun.

sentences.spanish: La semana pasada, yo viajé a México con mi amigo. El viaje fue fantástico.
sentences.english: Last week, I traveled to Mexico with my friend. The trip was fantastic.

sentences.spanish: Nosotros comimos mucha comida deliciosa y nadamos en el mar.
sentences.english: We ate a lot of delicious food and swam in the sea.

sentences.spanish: Mi amigo habló con muchas personas y yo tomé muchas fotos.
sentences.english: My friend spoke with many people and I took many photos.

sentences.spanish: Ahora, él y yo estamos en casa. Estamos cansados, pero muy contentos.
sentences.english: Now, he and I are at home. We are tired, but very happy.

sentences.spanish: El próximo año, nosotros vamos a ir a Perú. Vamos a ir a las montañas.
sentences.english: Next year, we are going to go to Peru. We are going to go to the mountains.

sentences.spanish: Va a ser una aventura nueva. No puedo esperar.
sentences.english: It is going to be a new adventure. I can't wait.

sentences.spanish: Ayer por la noche, yo fui a una fiesta con mis amigos.
sentences.english: Yesterday night, I went to a party with my friends.

sentences.spanish: Bailamos y cantamos mucho. La música fue muy buena.
sentences.english: We danced and sang a lot. The music was very good.

sentences.spanish: Yo comí pizza y bebí refrescos con mis amigos. La fiesta fue muy divertida.
sentences.english: I ate pizza and drank sodas with my friends. The party was very fun.

sentences.spanish: Hoy, yo estoy muy cansado. Tengo mucho sueño.
sentences.english: Today, I am very tired. I am very sleepy.

sentences.spanish: Mi amigo también está cansado. Él durmió solo cinco horas.
sentences.english: My friend is also tired. He slept only five hours.

sentences.spanish: Ahora, voy a descansar en mi cama por un rato.
sentences.english: Now, I am going to rest in my bed for a while.

sentences.spanish: Mañana, voy a ir al trabajo y no voy a ir a fiestas.
sentences.english: Tomorrow, I am going to go to work and I am not going to go to parties.

speaking.title: Tiempos Verbales
speaking.description: Preguntas y respuestas para practicar el uso del pasado, presente y futuro.

question.english: What did you do yesterday?

answer.spanish: Ayer hablé con mi amigo y fui al cine.
answer.english: Yesterday I spoke with my friend and went to the cinema.

question.english: What are you going to do tomorrow?

answer.spanish: Mañana voy a estudiar para un examen.
answer.english: Tomorrow I am going to study for a test.

question.english: What are you eating today?

answer.spanish: Hoy como pizza para la cena.
answer.english: Today I am eating pizza for dinner.

question.english: Where did you live last year?

answer.spanish: El año pasado viví en una casa grande.
answer.english: Last year I lived in a big house.

question.english: What did you do last week?

answer.spanish: La semana pasada hice mi tarea y vi una película.
answer.english: Last week I did my homework and watched a movie.

question.spanish: ¿Dónde vas a estar el próximo mes?
question.english: Where are you going to be next month?

answer.spanish: El próximo mes voy a estar de vacaciones.
answer.english: Next month I am going to be on vacation.

question.spanish: ¿Qué vas a hacer el fin de semana que viene?
question.english: What are you going to do next weekend?

answer.spanish: Voy a ir a un viaje con mi familia.
answer.english: I am going to go on a trip with my family.

question.english: Are you studying a lot today?

answer.spanish: Sí, yo estudio mucho hoy.
answer.english: Yes, I am studying a lot today.

question.english: Did you go to a party last night?

answer.spanish: Sí, fui a una fiesta muy divertida.
answer.english: Yes, I went to a very fun party.

question.spanish: ¿Qué vas a ser en el futuro?
question.english: What are you going to be in the future?

answer.spanish: En el futuro voy a ser un médico.
answer.english: In the future I am going to be a doctor.

question.english: Are you working today?

answer.spanish: Sí, yo trabajo hoy.
answer.english: Yes, I am working today.

question.english: Were you tired yesterday?

answer.spanish: Sí, estuve muy cansado ayer.
answer.english: Yes, I was very tired yesterday.

question.english: What music did you listen to last month?

answer.spanish: Escuché música pop el mes pasado.
answer.english: I listened to pop music last month.

question.spanish: ¿Vas a vivir en la misma ciudad?
question.english: Are you going to live in the same city?

answer.spanish: No, voy a vivir en una ciudad diferente.
answer.english: No, I am going to live in a different city.

question.english: Do you exercise every day?

answer.spanish: Sí, yo hago ejercicio todos los días.
answer.english: Yes, I exercise every day.

question.english: Was your trip fun?

answer.spanish: Sí, mi viaje fue muy divertido.
answer.english: Yes, my trip was very fun.

question.english: Are you going to travel next week?

answer.spanish: No, no voy a viajar la próxima semana.
answer.english: No, I am not going to travel next week.

question.english: How are you today?

answer.spanish: Hoy soy muy feliz.
answer.english: Today I am very happy.

question.english: Do you like to speak Spanish?

answer.spanish: Sí, me gusta hablar español. Hablo con mis amigos.
answer.english: Yes, I like to speak Spanish. I speak with my friends.

question.spanish: ¿Dónde vas a trabajar en el futuro?
question.english: Where are you going to work in the future?

answer.spanish: Voy a trabajar en la oficina de mi padre.
answer.english: I am going to work in my father's office.
